thread.title: All over for Ronnie and Lawrence in Emmerdale as he sets to destroy Chrissie? | Metro News
thread.title_full: All over for Ronnie and Lawrence in Emmerdale as he sets to destroy Chrissie? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: All over for Ronnie and Lawrence in Emmerdale as he sets to destroy Chrissie? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 7:02 am (Picture: ITV) 
Normally, it’s Chrissie White doing the scheming up at Home Farm but she well and truly took the bait in Emmerdale when Ronnie Hale set out to give her a taste of her own medicine and set her up. 
When Ronnie started behaving shiftily, Chrissie was unaware that this was deliberately for her benefit and, as she later accused him of stealing a digger, she was left looking foolish when the real explanation showed him as totally innocent. 
As a result, Lawrence was left fuming at Chrissie, seeing her as determined to sabotage his relationship with Ronnie, little knowing that this was apparently Ronnie’s intention all along. (Picture: ITV) 
With Lachlan having turned his back on her and now Lawrence not wanting anything to do with her, Chrissie is left questioning her future which prompts a concerned Rebecca to intervene. 
After telling Lawrence that Ronnie set Chrissie up, Rebecca goes a step further and handcuffs Lawrence and Chrissie together after seeing that Chrissie plans to move away for good. (Picture: ITV) 
As Ronnie guiltily looks on, will he confess the truth? And, if so, could this be the end for him and Lawrence? 
Whatever happens, Lawrence’s future happiness seems in doubt once more as everything looks set to fall apart. 
One to watch: Wednesday 8th March at 7pm on ITV. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
